name: Tracadie Bird Shit
description:
Play as a bird in a small city called Tracadie and make the right choices to be able to complete the story. There will be a lot of yelling and weird situations so if you're into that "absurd humor" this game might interest you. This game is a simple visual novel where clicking is the only thing you will need to do to progress in the story.


Key Features

-Funny Story

-French Voice Acting

-Choices Matter
